## Overview 
This case study uses global greenhouse gas (GHG) emission data from the European Commission's [Emissions Database for Global Atmospheric Research](https://edgar.jrc.ec.europa.eu/report_2024#data_download), and connecting it back to foundational theoretical aspects of cosmopolitan justice.

## Learning Outcomes
- Conduct Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
- Identify potential patterns in data
- Use the foundations of good graphics to communicate findings
- Connect findings to theoretical understandings of cosmopolitan justice
